response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will provide substantial value to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This includes not only the cost of the item itself but also an extended warranty and personalized support for a seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your company.", "product_price": 12000}
